question: What is Astra Nova?
answer: Astra Nova is a new global Web3 Gaming company focused on creating lasting community value for avid gamers and NFT enthusiasts. Our core products to achieve this mission: Deviants NFT Collection & Astra Nova MetaRPG.

question: What does Astra Nova mean?
answer: Astra Nova represents a ‘New Beginning’. The word “Astra” means Star in Latin. “Nova” means Newly visible Star, signifying the rebirth of users when they enter our metaverse

question: Is Astra Nova a multi chain metaverse?
answer: At the moment no, But we do intend to make Astra Nova a multi-chain metaverse in the future.

question: What are the various NFTs of Astra Nova?
answer:
A. Deviants : There will be 10,000 characters which will be minted as NFT’s with certain perks and powers. They act as the key to the Astra Nova ecosystem.

B. Orion’s Realm: Virtual Land NFTs, divided into 5,500 virtual land NFTs consisting of cities, forests, farmlands etc. which can be minted. These NFTs will be assigned in a randomised manner to all the NFT title-deed holders.

C. Sentinels: Limited edition of 140 Smart NFTs with AI Capabilities, will be released on the platform. Possessing these Sentinels grants the possessor extraordinary privileges, thus transforming him or her into the 'Councillor' of particular areas of the virtual territory in the game.
